work.name: Next IT
work.description: As the lead front end developer at Next IT I worked on multitude of projects. I built websites, landing pages, emails, helped develop some of our internal web based tools and products. I was also in charge of web accessiblity efforts and I would help anyone who may have been stuck on a particularly challenging front end based challenge. I built websites into content management systems as well as helped with design here and there.

work.name: Next IT blog
work.description: The Next IT blog is built ontop of the Wordpress CMS. This is a custom built template with backend integration custom made to manage our subscriptions.
